com.jetdrone.vertx.yoke.middleware

Interface AuthHandler


  • public interface AuthHandler
    # AuthHandler AuthHandler interface that needs to be implemented in order to validate usernames/passwords.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handle(String username, String password, org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject> result)
      Handles a challenge authentication request and asynchronously returns the user object on success, null for error.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        void handle(String username,
          String password,
          org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject> result)
        Handles a challenge authentication request and asynchronously returns the user object on success, null for error.
        Parameters:
        username - the security principal user name
        password - the security principal password
        result - authentication result
